name: PlaygroundBluetoothCentralManager.ConnectionError
desc: The errors you may encounter when connecting a peripheral to the central manager for the current playground page.

items.name: case connectionFailed
items.desc: The error that occurs when a peripheral fails to connect to the central manager.

items.name: case connectionLost
items.desc: The error that occurs when a peripheral connection to the central manager fails.

items.name: case excessiveConnections
items.desc: The error that occurs when a peripheral rejects a connection to the central manager because there are too many others.

items.name: case invalidState
items.desc: The error that occurs when the central manager is in a state that canâ€™t make connections.

items.name: case timeoutExpired
items.desc: The error that occurs when a peripheral fails to connect to the central manager before the timeout period expires.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: A string containing the localized description of the error.

items.name: static func != (PlaygroundBluetoothCentralManager.ConnectionError, PlaygroundBluetoothCentralManager.ConnectionError) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns true when the two connection errors being compared aren't the same.
